H0.text: who penned the famous indian epic the ramayana. Vyasa

H1.text: who penned the famous indian epic the ramayana. Kalidasa

H2.text: who penned the famous indian epic the ramayana. Tulsidas

H3.text: who penned the famous indian epic the ramayana. Valmiki

A4.text: The Ramayana, originally written by Valmiki, consists of 24,000 shlokas and seven cantos (kaṇḍas).

A5.text: He is revered as Ādi Kavi, the first poet, author of Ramayana, the first epic poem.
